title: Lemon Tart
description: A buttery golden crust filled with tangy lemon curd and topped with powdered sugar, this lemon tart perfectly balances sweetness and citrusy zest.

title: Raspberry Cheesecake
description: A creamy cheesecake swirled with vibrant raspberry puree on a buttery graham cracker crust, offering a perfect blend of tangy fruitiness and rich indulgence.

title: Strawberry Blueberry Waffles
description: Crispy golden waffles topped with fresh strawberries and blueberries, drizzled with syrup for a perfect balance of sweetness and crunch.

title: Coca-cola
description: A refreshing, ice-cold classic with crisp carbonation and the perfect balance of sweetness and bold cola flavor.

title: Fruit Punch
description: A vibrant blend of tropical fruit flavors, perfectly chilled for a refreshing and sweet burst of sunshine in every sip.

title: Orange Juice
description: Freshly squeezed and bursting with citrusy goodness, our orange juice delivers a naturally sweet and refreshing taste in every sip.

title: Sprite
description: A crisp and refreshing lemon-lime soda with just the right balance of sweetness and fizz to brighten your day.

title: Water
description: Plain' ol water to quench your thirst and keep you hydrated.

title: Burrito
description: A warm, soft tortilla wrapped around a flavorful mix of seasoned protein, rice, beans, fresh veggies, and a touch of zesty salsa.

title: Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, crisp lettuce, fresh tomatoes, and tangy pickles, all nestled in a soft, toasted bun.

title: Chicken Burger
description: A tender, grilled chicken patty topped with crispy lettuce, juicy tomatoes, and creamy mayonnaise, all inside a soft, toasted bun.

title: Chicken Chop
description: A juicy, tender chicken chop grilled to perfection, served with a savory sauce and accompanied by potatoes and fresh veggies.

title: Chicken Sausage Burrito
description: A warm tortilla wrapped around flavorful chicken sausage, seasoned rice, beans, and a blend of fresh veggies, topped with a zesty sauce.

title: Fish and Chips
description: Crispy battered fish fillets served with golden, crispy fries and a side of tartar sauce for the perfect classic British meal.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: A perfectly grilled salmon fillet with a crispy exterior and tender, flaky interior, served with a squeeze of lemon and a side of fresh vegetables.

title: Mac and Cheese
description: Creamy, cheesy macaroni enveloped in a rich, velvety sauce, baked to golden perfection with a crispy, buttery topping.

title: Mignon with carrot puree
description: A tender, perfectly cooked filet mignon paired with smooth, velvety carrot puree, creating a luxurious balance of flavors and textures.

title: Ribs
description: Succulent, fall-off-the-bone ribs glazed with a smoky, sweet BBQ sauce, served with a side of crispy fries and tangy coleslaw.

title: Roast Chicken
description: A perfectly roasted chicken with crispy, golden skin and juicy, tender meat, served with a side of savory potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

title: Steak
description: A juicy, expertly cooked steak with a rich, savory crust and tender, flavorful interior, served with your choice of sides for a satisfying meal.

title: Lasagne
description: Layers of tender pasta sheets, rich tomato-based meat ragù, velvety béchamel sauce, and a blend of melted mozzarella and Parmesan cheese, baked to golden perfection.

title: Turkey Bacon Aglio Olio
description: A flavorful twist on the classic Italian dish, featuring al dente spaghetti tossed with fragrant garlic, chili flakes, and olive oil. Savory turkey bacon adds a smoky richness, complemented by a sprinkle of fresh parsley and grated Parmesan for a perfectly balanced and satisfying meal.

title: Pesto Pasta
description: A vibrant and aromatic dish featuring al dente pasta coated in a luscious basil pesto sauce. Made with fresh basil, pine nuts, garlic, Parmesan cheese, and extra virgin olive oil, the sauce delivers a perfect balance of herbaceous, nutty, and cheesy flavors.

title: Zucchini Pomodoro Pasta
description: A light and refreshing dish featuring al dente pasta tossed in a vibrant tomato-based pomodoro sauce. Fresh zucchini adds a tender, subtly sweet touch, while garlic, olive oil, and herbs enhance the natural flavors.

title: Classic Mozzarella Pizza
description: A timeless favorite featuring a golden, hand-tossed crust topped with rich tomato sauce and generously layered with creamy, melted mozzarella cheese. Baked to perfection for a bubbly, gooey finish and garnished with a touch of fresh basil for a burst of flavor.

title: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A classic delight with a crispy, hand-tossed crust, smothered in rich tomato sauce and topped with creamy melted mozzarella cheese. Finished with a generous layer of spicy, savory pepperoni slices, baked to golden, bubbly perfection.

title: Spinach Pizza
description: A wholesome favorite featuring a golden, hand-tossed crust topped with creamy mozzarella cheese, tender sautéed spinach, and a rich garlic-infused tomato cream sauce.

title: Chicken Wings
description: Juicy, tender chicken wings, seasoned to perfection and cooked until crispy. Served with a side of creamy ranch dressing for the perfect dip.

title: Shoestring Fries
description: Crispy, golden, and perfectly seasoned thin-cut fries, fried to a light crunch. Served hot and ideal for dipping into ketchup.

title: Onion Rings
description: Crispy, golden-brown rings of sweet onion, coated in a light, seasoned batter and fried to perfection. Crunchy on the outside, tender on the inside.
